name: Book of Combos 1
notes: Possessing it increases combination success rate by 5%.

name: Book of Combos 2
notes: Possessing both Book of Combos 1 and 2 increases combination success rate by 10%.

name: Book of Combos 3
notes: Possessing both Book of Combos 1 and 2 and 3 increases combination success rate by 20%.

name: Book of Combos 4
notes: Possessing both Book of Combos 1 and 2 and 3 and 4 increases combination success rate by 30%.

name: Book of Combos 5
notes: Possessing both Book of Combos 1 and 2 and 3 and 4 and 5 increases combination success rate by 45%.

name: Alchemy Guide
notes: Possessing it enables alchemy.

name: Potion
notes: Restores 30 HP.

name: Mega Potion
notes: Restores 50 HP.

name: Nutrients
notes: Increases max HP by 10.

name: Mega Nutrients
notes: Increases max HP by 20.

name: Antidote
notes: Cures poison.

name: Immunizer
notes: Doubles red gauge recovery speed for 10 minutes.

name: Power Juice
notes: Prevents stamina depletion for 3 minutes and increases max stamina by 25.

name: Mega Juice
notes: Prevents stamina depletion for 6 minutes and increases max stamina by 50.

name: Demondrug
notes: Increases base attack (weapon multiplier) by 3 until quest ends or fainting.

name: Mega Demondrug
notes: Increases base attack (weapon multiplier) by 5 until quest ends or fainting.

name: Power Pill
notes: Increases base attack by 25 for 20 seconds. No pose after consuming.

name: Armorskin
notes: Increases defense by 10 until quest ends or fainting.

name: Mega Armorskin
notes: Increases defense by 20 until quest ends or fainting.

name: Armor Pill
notes: Increases defense by 50 and grants super armor for 20 seconds. No pose after drinking.

name: Cool Drink
notes: Grants heat resistance (Small) for 600 seconds. Duration is reduced in Large heat areas (only 400 seconds there).

name: Hot Drink
notes: Grants cold resistance (Small) for 600 seconds. Duration is reduced in Large cold areas (only 400 seconds there).

name: Thawing Agent
notes: Removes snowman status.

name: Psychoserum
notes: Reveals large monster locations for 10 seconds.

name: Herbal Medicine
notes: Cures poison and restores 10 HP.

name: Max Potion
notes: Increases max HP to 150 (cap) and fully restores HP.

name: Ancient Potion
notes: Same as Max Potion effect plus max stamina increase to cap.

name: Energy Drink
notes: Increases max stamina by 25 and cures fatigue.

name: Lifepowder
notes: Restores 50 HP to all hunters and comrades in the same area.

name: Powercharm
notes: Increases base attack (weapon multiplier) by 6.

name: Powertalon
notes: Increases base attack (weapon multiplier) by 9 (15 total with the talisman).

name: Armorcharm
notes: Increases defense by 15.

name: Armortalon
notes: Increases defense by 25 (40 total with the talisman).

name: Raw Meat
notes: Can be placed as a trap.

name: Poisoned Meat
notes: Can be placed as a trap. Poisons monsters that eat it.

name: Tainted Meat
notes: Can be placed as a trap. Paralyzes monsters that eat it.

name: Drugged Meat
notes: Can be placed as a trap. Puts monsters to sleep when eaten.

name: Rare Steak
notes: Increases max stamina by 25.

name: Well-Done Steak
notes: Increases max stamina by 50.

name: Gourmet Steak
notes: Increases max stamina to the cap (150).

name: Burnt Meat
notes: 50% chance to increase or decrease stamina by 25.

name: Hot Meat
notes: Hot Drink effect + increases max stamina by 25.

name: Cold Meat
notes: Cool Drink effect + increases max stamina by 25.

name: Rare Fish
notes: Restores red portion of the HP gauge.

name: Gourmet Fish
notes: Restores HP and doubles natural recovery rate for 3 minutes.

name: Gourmet Fish+
notes: Restores HP and doubles natural recovery rate for 5 minutes.

name: Burnt Fish
notes: 50% chance to restore or remove red portion of the HP gauge.

name: Boomerang
notes: Has cutting attribute.

name: Tranq Thrwng Knf
notes: Used for capturing monsters.

name: Paintball
notes: Reveals monster location for 10 minutes. Deals 0 damage on hit.

name: Flash Bomb
notes: Explodes in monster vision to blind them for a short period. Some monsters are immune or resistant.

name: Sonic Bomb
notes: Produces a sound wave when detonated.

name: Dung
notes: Can be spread on farm soil. Combination material for Dung Bomb.

name: Wyvern Droppings
notes: Can be spread on farm soil.

name: Dung Bomb
notes: Used before being noticed by a monster to make it flee to another area (special effect for Khezu).

name: Smoke Bomb
notes: Obscures vision. Allows visibility of Chameleos beyond the smoke.

name: Poison Smoke Bmb
notes: Releases weak poison gas in a small area.

name: Farcaster
notes: Returns to base camp. Fails if hit before teleporting.

name: Deodorant
notes: Cures food restriction status. Affects allies in range.

name: Tranq Bomb
notes: Used for capturing. Throw 2 at a trapped weakened monster.

name: Spiderweb
notes: Combination material for Net.

name: Net
notes: Combination material for Pitfall Trap. Usable as a farm net.

name: Trap Tool
notes: Combination material for Pitfall Trap and Shock Trap.

name: Pitfall Trap
notes: Traps most boss monsters except underground ones.

name: Shock Trap
notes: Paralyzes certain boss monsters (without inflicting paralysis). Destroyed if the monster moves underground.

name: Lightning Rod
notes: Deals 50 damage (75 with Bombardier). Usable only in rain. Inflicts paralysis buildup.

name: Barrel Lid
notes: Low-tier material.

name: Small Barrel
notes: Combination material for Small Barrel Bomb.

name: Large Barrel
notes: Combination material for Large Barrel Bomb.

name: Sm Barrel-Bomb
notes: Timed bomb. Deals 20 damage.

name: Sm Barrel-Bomb+
notes: Timed bomb. Deals 30 damage.

name: Lg Barrel-Bomb
notes: Impact-triggered bomb. Deals 80 damage. Detonates on impact.

name: Lg Barrel-Bomb+
notes: Impact-triggered bomb. Deals 150 damage. Detonates on impact.

name: Bounce Bomb
notes: Launches straight up. Deals 20 damage.

name: Bounce Bomb+
notes: Launches diagonally upward. Deals 30 damage.

name: Anti-Dragon Bomb
notes: Can be placed on large monsters when mounted.

name: Normal S Lv1
notes: Infinite ammo.

name: Tranq S
notes: Used for capturing monsters.

name: Paint S
notes: Marks a monster with paint.

name: CloseRngCoating
notes: Improves melee attack sharpness and changes critical distance.

name: Paint Coating
notes: Marks a monster with paint.

name: Cricket
notes: Can be used for fishing.

name: Worm
notes: Can be used for fishing. Can also be spread on farm soil.

name: Firefly
notes: Can be used for fishing.

name: Frog
notes: Only Plesioth will bite.

name: Tuna Bait
notes: Only tuna species will bite.

name: Goldenfish Bait
notes: Only Goldenfish will bite.

name: Mega Fishing Fly
notes: Can catch any fish on the first strike.

name: Old Pickaxe
notes: Used for mining ore in the field.

name: Iron Pickaxe
notes: Used for mining ore in the field.

name: Mega Pickaxe
notes: Used for mining ore in the field.

name: Expand Pickaxe
notes: Combines with ores or bugs to increase the number of obtained items.

name: Old Bugnet
notes: Used for gathering insects in the field.

name: Bugnet
notes: Used for gathering insects in the field.

name: Mega Bugnet
notes: Used for gathering insects in the field.

name: BBQ Spit
notes: Cooks raw meat into different types of cooked meat.

name: Gourmet BBQ Spit
notes: Easier to cook well-done meat. Can also cook well-done meat G.

name: Whetstone
notes: Restores 150 sharpness to weapons.

name: Binoculars
notes: Used for zooming in on distant objects. Functions like the variable scope of a bowgun.

name: Garbage
notes: Junk item created from failed combinations.

name: Flute
notes: Attracts monster attention. Can break upon use. Break chance reduces with Horn Maestro skill or Hunting Horn equipped.

name: Health Flute
notes: Heals all allies in the area. Same break mechanics as Flute.

name: Antidote Flute
notes: Cures poison for all allies in the area. Same break mechanics as Flute.

name: Demon Flute
notes: Increases attack power for all allies in the area. Same break mechanics as Flute.

name: Armor Flute
notes: Increases defense for all allies in the area. Same break mechanics as Flute.

name: Herb
notes: Restores 20 HP.

name: Antidote Herb
notes: 50% chance to cure poison or do nothing. Combination material for Antidote.

name: Felvine
notes: Felynes will prioritize stealing this item.

name: Toadstool
notes: Consuming it may poison the user. Increases or decreases max HP by 10.

name: Exciteshroom
notes: Consuming it causes random effects.

name: Spicy Mushroom
notes: Grants Hot Drink effect + increases max stamina by 25.

name: Power Seed
notes: Increases attack power by 10 for 3 minutes.

name: Armor Seed
notes: Increases defense by 40 for 3 minutes.

name: Frozen Berry
notes: Grants Cool Drink effect for 5 minutes + increases max stamina by 25.

name: Red Seed
notes: Can be planted in the farm.

name: Green Seed
notes: Can be planted in the farm.

name: Yellow Seed
notes: Can be planted in the farm.

name: Stone
notes: Can be thrown.

name: Knife Mackerel
notes: Functions as a whetstone. Combination material for Water Ammo.

name: Sushifish
notes: Restores 20 HP.

name: Glutton Tuna
notes: Restores HP or grants a random item.

name: Gastronome Tuna
notes: Restores HP or grants a random item.

name: Bitterbug
notes: Consuming it may either cure poison or cause minor damage.

name: Organizer Guide
notes: Increases item box capacity by 1 page (100 slots).

name: Backpacker Guide
notes: creases item box capacity by 1 page (100 slots).

name: Map
notes: Displays the map when carried.

name: First-Aid Med
notes: Restores 30 HP.

name: Ration
notes: Restores 25 stamina.

name: Portable Spit
notes: Functions like a regular BBQ set.

name: Mini Whetstone
notes: Restores 100 sharpness.

name: Prtbl Shock Trap
notes: Same as Shock Trap.

name: Supply Flash Bmb
notes: Same as Flash Bomb.

name: Sply Max Potion
notes: Increases max HP to the cap and fully restores HP.

name: Sply Pitfall Trp
notes: Same as Pitfall Trap.

name: Sply Lg Brrl Bmb
notes: Same as Large Barrel Bomb G (150 damage).

name: Ballista S
notes: Used in ballistae.

name: Cannon S
notes: Carried and loaded into a cannon.

name: Powderstone
notes: Causes HP depletion while held.

name: Khezu Whelp
notes: Causes HP depletion while held.
